description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the item $PACK-AND-HARNESS-\
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement - W8485-247824/D

The Department of National Defence (owning Government Contracting Entity) invites qualified suppliers to submit bidding proposals for a requirement under solicitation number W8485-247824/D.

### Tender Details

| **Category** | **Information**                 |
|--------------|---------------------------------|
| **Tender Title**            | Pack And Harness Assy           |
| **Solicitation Number**     | W8485-247824/D                  |
| **Publication Date**        | 2023-12-15                       |
| **Tender Closing Date**     | 2024-01-09T14:00:00              |
| **Amendment Number**        | 4                                |
| **Contracting Entity**      | Department of National Defence   |
| **Contract Address**        | 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7 |
| **End-User Entity**         | None                             |
| **Notice Type**             | None                                                                  |
| **Trade Agreements**         | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)                                  |

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking solutions for the supply of Pack And Harness Assy items. The delivery is requested at the depots named as soon as possible. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

The number of items required is as follows:

| **Item** |   **Description**   | **Part Number** | **NCAGE** | **Quantity** |  **Unit of Issue** |
|---------|----------------------|-----------------|----------|--------------|------------------|
| **1**   | Pack And Harness Assy| 8927592-1       | 36376    | 30           | Each             |

### Document

Complete tender documents, including specifications and terms and conditions, are available at the following links:

| **Language** |  **Documents URL**                                   |
|-------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| **English** | https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27688/w8485-247824-rfp-english.pdf  |
| **French**  | https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27688/w8485-247824-rfp-french.pdf             |


Please note that bidders may submit their proposals in either official
